id: Associate of Roger Stone says he expects to be indicted by Mueller
paragraph: By Sara Murray and Marshall Cohen, CNNUpdated 8:15 PM ET, Mon November 12, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)Roger Stone associate Jerome Corsi said Monday he expects to be indicted by special counsel Robert Mueller for "giving false information to the special counsel or to one of the other grand jury."CNN's Em Steck and Kara Scannell contributed to this report.
